mapper.insert: insert into employee (emp_num, emp_id, emp_pw, emp_name, emp_addr, emp_addr_detail, emp_post, emp_regi_date, emp_phone, emp_email, emp_jumin) values (#{empNum}, #{empId}, #{empPw}, #{empName}, #{empAddr}, #{empAddrDetail}, #{empPost}, now(), #{empPhone}, #{empEmail}, #{empJumin})
mapper.select: select emp_num empNum, emp_id empId, emp_pw empPw, emp_name empName, emp_addr empAddr, emp_addr_detail empAddrDetail, emp_post empPost, emp_regi_date empRegiDate, emp_phone empPhone, emp_email empEmail, emp_jumin empJumin from employee where emp_num = #{empNum}
